entities.name: oak
entities.description: The chapter is set in a forest with oak trees.

entities.name: silver-white doe
entities.description: A silver-white deer appears to Harry in the forest.

entities.name: Harry
entities.description: The protagonist of the story, who is waiting for someone.

entities.name: Hermione
entities.description: Someone Harry was supposed to meet, but forgot about until now.

relationships.description: Harry stares at the deer in wonder.
Harry was supposed to meet Hermione, but forgot about it until now.
The deer comes for Harry alone.
Harry calls out to the deer, asking it to come back.
